snippet: The concluding concert of this year’s Focus! festival featured the American premiere of a Schnittke symphony, as well as works by Sofia Gubaidulina and Arvo Pärt.
lead_paragraph: The concluding concert of this year’s Focus! festival featured the American premiere of a Schnittke symphony, as well as works by Sofia Gubaidulina and Arvo Pärt.

headline.seo: Schnittke-Inspired Focus! Concludes With Gubaidulina Work
headline.main: Colleagues’ Work Part of Alfred Schnittke’s Anniversary Party
headline.print_headline: Colleagues’ Work Part of Alfred Schnittke’s Anniversary Party
